'''Peter Woodthorpe''' voiced the part of [[Gollum]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]] and [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on the BBC 4.
